snippet: Govs. Terry Branstad and Jay Nixon say production of food and biofuels can sustainably coexist.
abstract: Letter by Iowa Gov Terry Branstad and Missouri Gov Jay Nixon comments on Jan 29 article about World Resources Institute report on inefficiencies of biofuels.
lead_paragraph: Govs. Terry Branstad and Jay Nixon say production of food and biofuels can sustainably coexist.

headline.print_headline: America’s Farmers Help Meet Our Energy Needs
headline.main: America’s Farmers Help Meet Our Energy Needs
